faq.title: We Answer Your Questions
faq.subtitle: The most common questions about our web development, AI, and digital positioning services.

items.question: What type of websites do you build?
items.answer: We create custom corporate websites for any industry: mining, healthcare, education, agro-tech, and more. Each site is designed with a unique visual identity, responsive layout, SEO optimization, and admin panel if needed. We use modern technologies like Nuxt.js, Vue.js, and Node.js.

items.question: Do you build WhatsApp chatbots?
items.answer: Yes, we create chatbots for WhatsApp Business with and without artificial intelligence. From simple bots for automated responses to smart assistants that understand context and can handle sales, schedule appointments, or resolve FAQs autonomously, 24 hours a day.

items.question: What is SEO, AEO, and LLMO positioning?
items.answer: SEO positions your site on Google. AEO (Answer Engine Optimization) optimizes your content to appear in direct search engine answers. LLMO (Large Language Model Optimization) prepares your brand to be recommended by AIs like ChatGPT and Gemini. We implement all three strategies for maximum visibility.

items.question: Do you develop custom systems or platforms?
items.answer: Yes, we develop SaaS platforms, dashboards, admin panels, and management systems. For example, we created Medicynia, an electronic clinical record system compliant with NOM-004-SSA3-2012, and portals with job vacancy management for mining companies.

items.question: Do you work with companies outside Durango?
items.answer: Yes, we work with local, national, and international clients. We have clients in Canada (Columbus Networks), the United States (Education America), and multiple Mexican states. Our team works remotely with bilingual Spanish-English communication.

items.question: What does AI training include?
items.answer: We offer hands-on workshops where your team learns to use AI for writing emails, automating office tasks, analyzing data, and creating content. We also implement WhatsApp chatbots and AI productivity tools. Everything is tailored to your industry and experience level.

items.question: Do you offer support after delivering a project?
items.answer: Yes, we offer ongoing support Monday through Friday from 9am to 5pm, with communication channels open for emergencies. We ensure your site or system works correctly and accompany you in its growth.
